alert.note: Alert for Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave; Lake Mead National Recreation Area (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued March 10 at 10:50PM MST until March 11 at 5:00AM MST by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 AM PST /5 AM MST/ FRIDAY... * WHAT...North winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected through the early morning hours. * WHERE...In Arizona, Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave, Lake Mead National Recreation Area. In California, San Bernardino County- Upper Colorado River Valley. In Nevada, Lake Mead National Recreation Area. * WHEN...Until 4 AM PST /5 AM MST/ Friday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Dangerous boating conditions due to enhanced wave activity on areas lakes. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Blowing dust and sand may reduce visibilities for brief periods of time.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Lake Havasu and Fort Mohave; Lake Mead National Recreation Area
